trait.name: Stout
trait.description: Start with +2 HP. Roll hit points per level with advantage.

trait.name: Farsight
trait.description: You get a +1 bonus to attack rolls with ranged weapons or a +1 bonus to spellcasting checks.

trait.name: Mighty
trait.description: You have a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls with melee weapons.

trait.name: Stealthy
trait.description: Once per day, you can become invisible for 3 rounds.

trait.name: Ambitious
trait.description: You gain one additional talent roll at 1st level.
